items.content_html: GIS Web App: A lightweight Geographic Information System (GIS) web application built with Leaflet.js. This app allows users to visualize various layers, handle GeoJSON and KML file uploads, and perform basic geospatial operations. Features include layer control, geocoding, and drawing functionalities.
items.title: AnitBhattacharjee/BasicGIS-App: GIS Web App: A lightweight Geographic Information System (GIS) web application built with Leaflet.js. This app allows users to visualize various layers, handle GeoJSON and KML file uploads, and perform basic geospatial operations. Features include layer control, geocoding, and drawing functionalities.
